channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Relevanssi
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Relevanssi

item.title: CVE-2024-9021|2024-10-09T15:20:50.596Z -- unknown -- relevanssi
item.description: In the process of testing the Relevanssi WordPress plugin before 4.23.1, a vulnerability was found that allows you to implement Stored XSS on behalf of the Contributor+ by embedding malicious script, which entails account takeover backdoor

item.title: CVE-2024-9021|2024-10-08T06:00:05.067Z -- unknown -- relevanssi
item.description: In the process of testing the Relevanssi WordPress plugin before 4.23.1, a vulnerability was found that allows you to implement Stored XSS on behalf of the Contributor+ by embedding malicious script, which entails account takeover backdoor
